EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Exec Dinner_SJ_Q215.Hadoop Dinner Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
It was a pleasure having you at our Hadoop Summit dinner last night. We hope you enjoyed the opportunity to network, catch-up with friends, and talk about the ever-changing world of Big Data.
If you haven't already, come by our booth to see the latest Big Data Suite demos, HAWQ on Hortonworks using Ambari, or just to talk to our industry experts.
Watch Sunny Madra’s Hadoop Summit interview with theCUBE here <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xIIcXdAAjw8&feature=youtu.be>.
Blog <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news-2/jignesh-patel-on-pivotals-acquisition-of-big-data-project-quickstep>: Jignesh Patel on Pivotal’s Acquisition of Big Data Project Quickstep
Cheers, The Pivotal Team
